title: Virtual Volume Button
description: Are you afraid that your volume keys will break soon?Don't you like that Android has no volume control on youtube and in the other multimedia applications?This application add a floating volume button on the screen. Use it to modify the volume.Thanks to Prajwal Divate for designing the Icon, Banner and Screenshots.(Google+ https://plus.google.com/+PrajwalKDivate)
descriptionHTML:
Are you afraid that your volume keys will break soon?
Don't you like that Android has no volume control on youtube and in the other multimedia applications?

This application add a floating volume button on the screen. Use it to modify the volume.

Thanks to Prajwal Divate for designing the Icon, Banner and Screenshots.
(Google+ https://plus.google.com/+PrajwalKDivate)
comments: It was great till latest update. Now it is always reminding to turn it on in accessibility service settings. I obeyed. But the buttons are still appearing on all apps. Hope it will be corrected soon. Thanks.
Not working from last update -  On screen volume button not showing after closing this app from background, before that its working perfectly.
My volume buttons on phone don't work so this app let's me controls all my volumes from ringtones to media. It's Awesome
wth it opens default audio panel which is on top of screen and I can't reach it single handedly so I needed a floating panel edit:sorry and thx :3
Nice app. Will it work to control alarm, phone volume etc...
I could not ask for more.
recentChanges: Removed the "Current App checking type" setting
New Setting "Vibrate on change volume using the notification"
Open Wear Play Store to install Wear App
Bug Fix: sidebar disappears when rotate mobile
